function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Growing nationalism and self-interest shown by countries and states competing for medical supplies","Impact":"Undermines international health and economic recovery efforts","Mitigation":"Promote collaboration and resource sharing at the international level","Technologies":"Global health data-sharing platforms and international cooperation initiatives","People":"Global population, healthcare systems, and economies","Owner":"International organizations, governments, and global health agencies"},{"Description":"Anthropocentric worldview and human-centered value system","Impact":"May lead to unsustainable practices and disregard for environmental issues","Mitigation":"Promote ecological awareness and sustainable development practices","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring tools, sustainable building technologies, and green infrastructure","People":"Societal and cultural communities, environmental advocates, and policymakers","Owner":"Environmental organizations, educational institutions, and government bodies"},{"Description":"Entrenched Cartesian-Newtonian mechanistic scientific paradigm","Impact":"Limits the exploration of holistic and systemic approaches to addressing climate change and biodiversity loss","Mitigation":"Encourage holistic, interdisciplinary, and systems thinking in scientific research and policy-making","Technologies":"Advanced modeling and simulation tools, interdisciplinary research platforms, and collaborative data-sharing systems","People":"Scientists, researchers, and policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, scientific organizations, and interdisciplinary research initiatives"}]}
